content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity Pole at position (12.8077, 10.8077) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK
- Electricity Pole at position (14.5, 9.5)
- Lab at position (10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### Furnace Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Wooden Chest
Consists of the following entity:
- Wooden Chest at position (5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL, contains 160 iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electricity connections
- Ensure that all electricity poles are properly connected to the electric network. Check the status of each pole and lab to confirm they are plugged in.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended placement area.

### Errors related to furnaces having no ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory to smelt in the furnaces. Check the inventory and supply chain to avoid running out of materials.
